attributes.action: introduce tough and strict legislation against knife/gun crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow the police to do stop and search on random youths with a metal detector.  If found with a knife or gun a strict sentence should be given with no slap on the wrist 'talks'.  Things will only change when the youth are afraid of the authority and not the other way around!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
